A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Sitting down in the theater for a new Star Wars movie is always special. The feeling is heightened by the entire room’s excitement. I left the theater thinking I had enjoyed myself\,...but that’s when the high wore off. Given some thought\, this movie has a ton of problems\, and lots of plot holes. Fans are not really given an homage to Star Wars the way The Force Awakens did. Instead\, they changed everything.
